synopsis.text: Shouji is a single father raising his young daughter Kana after the passing of his wife. To help them heal, they regularly watch an educational children's show called "Let's Sing Along!" starring the cheerful idol Minami. After a chance encounter, Shouji and Minami begin a secret relationship, finding solace in each other from their lonely lives. However, as a children's icon, Minami must keep up a pure public image and avoid any scandals at risk of losing her career. Shouji cares for Minami deeply but struggles with whether he can keep their romance hidden. Ultimately, they discover that everyone needs love - even beloved idols thought to be perfect. Their future happiness hinges on this difficult choice between following their hearts or society's expectations.
